main

Class GameView

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.GameView

  • public class GameView
extends java.lang.Object
    Controls what happens when a button is clicked on the main menu and what is the next action that the needs to happen in the game. It either makes a new instance of a view or controls what happens when a certain button is clicked on the BoardMenu or the LeaderBoard.
    Author:
    Ryan Barbera, Aaron George, Nick Norton, Thomas Pennington, Grant Zhao

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GameView(GameController gc, TutorialGameController tutorialController)
      Creates a GameView object that initializes each of the controllers that are needed in the game and starts up the main menu view to begin playing the game and selecting an option.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void boardMenuQuitButtonClicked()
      Exits the board menu and returns back to the main menu to select another option in the game.
      BoardMenuView getBoardMenu() 
      TutorialView getTutorialView() 
      void leaderBoardButtonClicked()
      Makes a new LeaderBoardView when the leader board button from the main menu view is clicked.
      void leaderBoardExitButtonClicked()
      Exits the leader board and disposes of the current JFrame and starts back up the main menu view to select another option in the game.
      void makeBoardMenu(int playerHealth, int playerMoney, int playerScore, long roundTime, long timeLeft)
      Makes a new BoardMenuView that initializes the score panel to the player health, score, and money.
      void makeTutorial(int playerHealth, int playerMoney, int playerScore, long roundTime, long timeLeft)
      Makes a new TutorialView when the tutorial button is clicked from the main menu view.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • GameView

        public GameView(GameController gc,
                TutorialGameController tutorialController)
        Creates a GameView object that initializes each of the controllers that are needed in the game and starts up the main menu view to begin playing the game and selecting an option.
        Parameters:
        gc - the current instance of the game controller class
        tutorialController - the current instance of the tutorialController class

    • Method Detail

      • makeBoardMenu

        public void makeBoardMenu(int playerHealth,
                          int playerMoney,
                          int playerScore,
                          long roundTime,
                          long timeLeft)
        Makes a new BoardMenuView that initializes the score panel to the player health, score, and money. Then it sets the timer panel to the amount of seconds that the rounds are going to last for.
        Parameters:
        playerHealth - what the players health in the game is initialized to
        playerMoney - what the players money in the game is initialized to
        playerScore - what the players score in the game is initialized to
        roundTime - what the round time is set to in the game
        timeLeft - how much time is remaining in the current round

      • makeTutorial

        public void makeTutorial(int playerHealth,
                         int playerMoney,
                         int playerScore,
                         long roundTime,
                         long timeLeft)
        Makes a new TutorialView when the tutorial button is clicked from the main menu view. It initializes the score panel to the player health, score, and money. Then it sets the timer panel to the amount of seconds that the rounds are going to last for.
        Parameters:
        playerHealth - what the players health in the game is initialized to
        playerMoney - what the players money in the game is initialized to
        playerScore - what the players score in the game is initialized to
        roundTime - what the round time is set to in the game
        timeLeft - how much time is remaining in the current round

      • leaderBoardButtonClicked

        public void leaderBoardButtonClicked()
        Makes a new LeaderBoardView when the leader board button from the main menu view is clicked. It takes in the current score of the round and checks it against the other high scores that have been previously set. If the score is in the top 10, then the score is added to the leaderboard.

      • boardMenuQuitButtonClicked

        public void boardMenuQuitButtonClicked()
        Exits the board menu and returns back to the main menu to select another option in the game.

      • leaderBoardExitButtonClicked

        public void leaderBoardExitButtonClicked()
        Exits the leader board and disposes of the current JFrame and starts back up the main menu view to select another option in the game.

      • getBoardMenu

        public BoardMenuView getBoardMenu()

      • getTutorialView

        public TutorialView getTutorialView()
